special-userbitcoinaddresses:
{{doc-special|UserBitcoinAddresses}}
Special page for the user to upload Bitcoin addresses to be used by other Bitcoin related extensions.
userbtcaddr-loginrequired: Displayed if anon user attempts to call Special:UserBitcoinAddresses, states that login is required.
userbtcaddr-submitaddresses-manualinsert: Label of form allowing manually inserting the user's Bitcoin addresses.
Respective label for Bitcoin addresses input text area.
